text: Lowestoft is a town in Suffolk. Flint tools were found at Pakefield in south Lowestoft in 2005. This showed that humans had been living in the Lowestoft area 200,000 years ago. This means Lowestoft is one of the earliest known sites for humans in the United Kingdom. ==References== Category:Towns in Suffolk Category:Civil parishes in Suffolk Category:Port cities and towns of England
title: Lowestoft
